resources.string:
ST25 NFC Tap App is an Android application dedicated to handle the ST NFC tag ST25TA (CLOUD ST25TA02K-P), the dynamic NFC tag M24SR (M24SR Nucleo shield and M24SR Discovery boards), the Dual Interface EEPROMs of the M24LRxx family, the ST25TV series and the ST25DV series Dynamic NFC Tags. 

It allows the user to store or read NDEF messages such as NDEF URL, SMS, Email, vCard (including picture), AAR and proprietary messages. NDEF Multi-records is also available. 

Specific demonstration features such as FW update, image transfers are available and work with specific firmware and Discovery kits.

List of \'preferred applications\' associated to system actions.\n\nClick on Edit icon if you want to remove an association. When the action occurs, if no more preferred application is associated to this action, Android will display a popup asking the user to choose what to do.
No NDEF data or unknown data
Area protected in read. Click here to unlock it.
Error! This tag doesn\'t have a password interface!
PWM1 and/or PWM2 is not enabled or set with an invalid frequency. Do you want to enable them with default values?
PWM set in HiZ during RF cmds
PWM at 25% of full power during RF cmds
Frequency reduced and PWM at 25% of full power during RF cmds
Information retrieval on going ....Please keep reader close to the tag.
Please specify the memory range that you want to dump to a file:
Please select a source file and specify the destination offset at which you want to write those data in Tag\'s memory.
The files are located in internal memory Download folder.
Which Firmware do you want to use?
Pick up a firmware in phone\'s memory storage
Tap on an area to set its permissions:
Create a plain text NDEF record
Edit this plain text NDEF record
Create a Wifi handover NDEF record
Edit this Wifi handover NDEF record
Create a Bluetooth handover NDEF record
Create a Bluetooth low energy handover NDEF record
Edit a Bluetooth handover NDEF record
Edit a Bluetooth low energy handover NDEF record
Create an android app Launcher NDEF record
Edit this android app Launcher NDEF record
Empty NDEF record - No data available
Error during read operation. Read %d bytes
Read and Write protected by password
Read protected by password. Write impossible (even with password)
Enter a block number for which you want to see the status (locked or unlocked) or that you want to lock:
Warning: The Lock is permanent so locked blocks cannot be written anymore.
Select the password for this area:
1 single area of 2 Kbits.\n(Area protected by a 64 bits password)
2 independent areas of 1 Kbits each.\n(Each area protected by a 32 bits password)
Error while erasing the tag memory! Please check if some areas are protected in write.
Error! No password selected for this Area! Please go to \'Area Security Status\' and select a password for this Area.
NB: On ST25TV tags, the \'Kill\' and \'Untraceable Mode\' features are using the same password (= password 0).
This tag has a signature verification feature.\n\nPlease contact STMicroelectronics to get more information about this feature.
The tag\'s signature allows to check if this tag has been produced and signed by STMicroelectronics.
Tamper detect status (collected when the tag was powered ON):

WARNING: Once the untraceable mode enabled, the tag will no more answer to Android phones.

It will only answer to NFC readers implementing some special commands.

A confirmation will be asked before enabling this untraceable mode."
Please enter Kill/Untraceable Mode Password. WARNING! The tag will not be usable anymore on Android phones!
Permanently kill this tag (a confirmation will be asked):
Please enter Kill Password. WARNING! The kill action is IRREVERSIBLE!
Please enter Configuration Password. WARNING! The lock action is IRREVERSIBLE!
EAS ID (free to use identifier. 16 bits hex value):
EAS Telegram containing article description:\n(32 Bytes max)
An alarm was triggered for this article:
When enabled, ST25TV\'s write counter is incremented when the tag\'s EEPROM is successfully written.\n\nIn case of multiple writes, it is incremented only once per RF session.
NFC not available on this phone!
Tag\'s configuration is done through a set of registers. A configuration password should be presented before changing the content of a register.
Tag\'s configuration can be permanently locked. In that case, it is not possible to change any register anymore through RF command.
Please Select a buffer size in Bytes
Buffer size is given by host
Move the bottom edge of Area1, Area2, Area3 to change the number of areas and their sizes.
Area4 will take all the remaining space up to the end of the tag\'s memory.
Fine tuning of selected area\'s end:
Configuration password is required to modify registers
Action failed or cancelled! Tag not updated!
All register values are in hexadecimal format.
Please tap a new tag where you want to write this NDEF message. The NDEF message will be written to the tag as soon as you tap it.
When you\'re done with a tag, you can continue with another tag by simply taping it.
The cloning is possible even with tags of different type.
The tag is write protected. Cloning not possible!
Not able to retrieve NDEF message from byte array data
Please Select first a firmware to update
GPO not available for this Tag
Once enabled, the Electronic Article Surveillance will trigger an alarm every times the tag is read by a NFC Gate (for example at the exit of a shop or library)
Go to EAS menu to disable the Electronic Article Surveillance for this tag:
| Sector access | when password | not presented
| The sector is not protected by password
| The sector is protected by password 1
| The sector is protected by password 2
| The sector is protected by password 3
Cannot continue without the permission to read or write memory storage!
Cannot continue without the permission to read the memory!
File name error, data not saved!
Warning! ST25DV\'s mailbox is currently enabled so EEPROM writting is not possible. Go to \'Mailbox management\' if you want to disable it.
Error while reading the register values!
Cloning not possible: No valid NDEF message set!
Cloning not possible: No record in NDEF message set!
Cloning issue on current NDEF message !
Error! Not able to convert HEX string [ %1$s ] to Int
Error [ %1$s ] while reading the content of %2$s
Cannot continue without permission to use the camera!
Your device doesn\'t support the crop feature
Tag updated with GPO in %1$s mode
Tag not in the correct configuration mode
Warning: Cmd not executed - reverse not available :
Counter already locked. Unlock Counter not possible
Fail to update, value out of bounds
An action must be selected first!
EAS alarm but failed to read EAS_ID or Telegram !
Discovery successful but failed to read the tag!
Empty picture or picture not selected
No use case selected - Please, select a use case first
Do you want to erase the tag\'s memory?
Data not written to the tag. Are you sure that you want to leave the edition mode?
Are you sure you want to delete this record?
NDEF message too big for this Area.
Do you want to clone this NDEF to some other tags?
Select the NDEF record to add
The number of areas cannot be changed while some areas are protected in read or in write. Please remove the area protections first.
Do you really want to lock the configuration?
WARNING! This action is IRREVERSIBLE. Are you sure that you want to lock this block?
Some protections have been set for this Area but no password number is currently selected. Do you want to select a password number now?

This permament mode is IRREVERSIBLE. If you set this mode and want to disable the Electronic Article Surveillance feature, you will have to enable the untraceable mode. The tag will not be usable anymore.
Do you want to lock the kill password?
Feature not yet available for this Tag
Location permission not granted!\nThis permission is needed to scan the Wifi Access Points available.
Data not written to the tag. Are you sure that you want to leave this screen?
Do you really want to change security status ?
Bad music defined - Tone and duration not aligned
Feature under NDA. Contact your local ST office to get the full software.
Writing NDEF message to Tag in progress.... \nRemove device from field to abort operation \n Or wait until end of operation

The system settings for app ' %1$s ' are going to be opened.
In 'Open by default' entry, you can cancel the assignations for this application.

Use back key to come back to current application
The specified sector is already locked and thus cannot be locked again.
WARNING! KeyId 00 is for test only!
No Certificate with the keyId %s found!
Spongy Castle crypto libraries are missing: Please add them to app/build.gradle
Certificates location cannot be changed on Android versions lower than LOLLIPOP (= Android API 21).\n\nPlease put the certificates at the indicated location (%1$s)
Cannot continue without permission to read contacts!
[Long click on a raw for edition]
Write to several protected areas or area capacity limit not yet managed
Read of several protected areas or area capacity limit not yet managed
WARNING: Sector locked. Security Status can only be changed through I2C
WARNING! ANDEF feature is currently enabled but the tag doesn\'t contain a valid URI. Do you want to disable the ANDEF feature?
Area2 will take all the remaining User Memory space.
Move the bottom edge of Area1 to change the number of areas and their sizes.
Please tap the tag again to updates its configuration
- Tag no more answering to the Inventory command but only to \'Toggle Untraceable\' and \'Get Random Number\' commands.\n- Mode reversible on PC only (thanks to the Untraceable Mode password).

- Tag answering to the Inventory command but with a special UID (0xE0 02 00 00 00 00 00 00), the same for every tags in Untraceable Mode.\n- Mode reversible on Android and PC (thanks to the Untraceable Mode password).
Untraceable Mode enabled when Tamper Detect open
Untraceable Mode enabled when Tamper Detect short
Do you want to lock the PRIV_CFG feature?
Keep the PRIV_CFG feature unlocked.\nIt can be changed in the future thanks to the Configuration Password.
Lock the PRIV_CFG feature.\nWARNING: This is irreversible!
Please enter the Untraceable Mode password
Please enter the Untraceable Mode password. This verification is done because this password will be needed to leave the Untraceable mode.
You have reached the last step of the configuration.\n\nAre you sure that you want to activate the Untraceable Mode?
Warning: Untraceable Mode configuration is permanently locked.
Warning: Untraceable Mode is now permanently disabled.\n\nGo to Untraceable menu if you want to reenable it.
Do you want to permamently disable the Untraceable Mode?
For experimented users, an expert mode is available:
Select the ANDEF elements to use:
Please keep the phone on the NFC Tag during URI configuration.\n\nPress OK when it is done...
Please enter 8 ASCII characters to set\nin the custom message
WARNING! The ASCII string contains some characters not compliant with iOS.
You can configure the character(s) displayed\nfor each event:
Edition not activated! Please click on Edition icon first
Unique Tap Code ASCII value:\n(as displayed in ANDEF)
Unique Tap Code configuration is locked!
Two different passwords can be protected:
Max number of PWD errors allowed [0..7]
Do you want to read the configuration of each Password protection?\n(Configuration Password is needed)
Error! The two protections should not be set on the same Password
Augmented NDEF cannot be set when the tag contains some non URI Records. Please delete those records first.
WARNING! Invalid CCFile. Native NDEF processing will not work on Android versions lower than Android 9. Do you want to fix the CCFile?
NB: On ST25TVC tags, the \'Kill\' and \'Configuration\' password are the same password (= password 0).

The Untraceable Mode feature can be used to comply with the GDPR policy.

Once in Untraceable Mode, the UID of the tag will not be visible anymore.

A wizard can help you to configure the Untraceable Mode fitting your need:"
The Untraceable Mode password is a key information needed if you want to enter or leave the Untraceable Mode:
Warning: Augmented NDEF URL should contain a \'?\'. Do you want to continue?
Use the demo Firmware for MB1283 embedded in this application
Use the demo Firmware for MB1396 embedded in this application
Do you want to add a question mark (\'?\') at the end of ANDEF URL?
Please enter 14 ASCII characters to set\nin the custom message
Warning: TLVs Area size cannot\nbe decreased once configured!
TLVs_Area size = 160 Bytes\nTruST25 Signature available\nANDEF CustomMsg available
TLVs_Area size = 192 Bytes\nTruST25 Signature unavailable\nANDEF CustomMsg available
TLVs_Area size = 208 Bytes\nTruST25 Signature unavailable\nANDEF CustomMsg unavailable
This action is IRREVERSIBLE. Are you sure that you want to change the tag\'s memory configuration?

WARNING! The tag is configured for Extended memory configuration but doesn't contain the right TLVs to:
- skip the System Area
- Indicate to location of Dynamic Lock Area

Do you want to set the right TLVs?
WARNING! This ST25TN5212 doesn\'t contain the right TLVs to indicate to location of the Dynamic Lock Area\n\nDo you want to set the right TLVs?
WARNING! An error occured during the TLVs parsing.\n\nDo you want to fix the TLVs?
Do you want to lock the \'kill\' feature?\nWarning: This action is IRREVERSIBLE!
Do you want to lock the kill password?\nWarning: This action is IRREVERSIBLE!

Current memory configuration: Default mode.

No TLV needed for this mode.

Dynamic Lock Area is located at block 44, right after the T2T_Area.
Some TLVs are needed to:\n- Indicate the position of Dynamic Lock Area (block 44).\n- Skip blocks 45 to 51 of System Area.
The current TLVs are NOT correct. Do you want to set the correct ones?
WARNING: Changed done in One Time Programming registers cannot be reverted! Do you want to continue?
WARNING: When using Extended Modes memory configuration, TruST25 signture might have been overwritten by NDEF content!
WARNING: When using Extended Mode 2 memory configuration, Custom Message and ANDEF separator might have been overwritten by NDEF content!
WARNING! This action is IRREVERSIBLE. Do you want to continue?
Tag not in the field!\n\nPlease put the phone on the Tag and press the \'Refresh\' button.
All Locks are set. Do you want to update the CCFile to set the Tag as Read-Only?
Do you want to lock the TruST25 signature?\nWarning: This action is IRREVERSIBLE!
WARNING! The size indicated in the CCFile (0x%x) doesn\'t correspond to a valid memory configuration.
Do you want to change it to the closest valid value (0x%x)?
No valid value can be set. This tag is definitely corrupted!
Warning: An Extended Memory mode is currently set. Signature might have been corrupted by NDEF content.
To run the FTM demos, you will need:
- a ST25DV Discovery Kit (MB1283) running the stsw-st25dv001 firmware (version 1.2.0 minimum).
- a ST25DV64KC-DISCO Kit (MB1396) running the stsw-st25dv002 firmware (version 2.1.0 minimum).
Please put the phone on the board and click on FTM button of the Kit.
ST25DV\'s mailbox not enabled! Do you want to enable it?
Please select the picture to send:
NB: Picture size is reduced to fit in 100 kB
Please select a picture on the Discovery Board and press \'OK\'
Please select a data size on the Discovery Board and press \'OK\'
Please put the phone on the Discovery board
Please update the firmware of the board MB1396 to the latest version (Ver. %d.%d.%d minimum).
Please update the firmware of the board MB1283 to the latest version (Ver. %d.%d.%d minimum).
NB: The Firmware should be updated from a PC and not from the current Android App.
Failed to retrieve the board name and FW version. Please update the firmware of the board to the latest version.
The protocol is able to detect transmission errors and to recover. This is the recommended mode.
Data transfer is done at max throughput. No recovery in case of error.
Discover how NFC can be used to launch an application or propose the installation from App stores.
This solution works on both Android and iOS. It is based on multiple NDEF Records:
- One NDEF record to launch or install the iOS App (Universal Link URI record)
- One NDEF record to launch or install the Android App (AAR record)
- Optional: Another NDEF record can be added to store some data that will be processed by the Android and iOS Apps (ex: commissioning data)
Tag updated. If you tap the tag with an Android or Iphone, it will now launch the ST25 NFC Tap application or proprose to install it from App stores.
